title: qSOFA (Quick SOFA) Score for Sepsis
desc: The qSOFA (Quick SOFA) Score for Sepsis identifies high-risk patients for in-hospital mortality with suspected infection outside the ICU.

orgreference.text: Seymour CW, Liu VX, Iwashyna TJ, et al. Assessment of Clinical Criteria for Sepsis: For the Third International Consensus Definitions for Sepsis and Septic Shock (Sepsis-3). JAMA. 2016;315(8):762-774.

other_refer.text: Singer M, Deutschman CS, Seymour C, et al. The Third International Consensus Definitions for Sepsis and Septic Shock (Sepsis-3). JAMA. 2016;315(8):801-810. doi:10.1001/jama.2016.0287.
